scripts.dev-fx: tsc src/dev/local.ts --outDir dist --sourceMap && node dist/dev/local.js update-fx
scripts.dev-indexes: tsc src/dev/local.ts --outDir dist --sourceMap && node dist/dev/local.js update-indexes
scripts.dev-stocks: tsc src/dev/local.ts --outDir dist --sourceMap && node dist/dev/local.js update-stocks
